dcterms:description: The Olympus benchmark is a synthetic simulation model based on a typical North Sea offshore oilfield, used to compare the effectiveness of different optimization algorithms.
dcterms:title: Olympus benchmark

dcterms:description: An ensemble of 10 simulation model realizations used to capture subsurface uncertainty in oilfield production optimization studies.
dcterms:title: Ensemble of 10 realizations

dcterms:creator: E. J. M. Baumann
S. I. Dale
M. C. Bellout
dcterms:description: A single realization case used for optimization studies in oilfield production, focusing on a representative simulation model.
dcterms:title: Single realization case
